units.title: Cadence function test suite
changes: M-030: Added 40 tests covering all 38 exported cadence functions

Tests cover: export completeness, context pressure zone logic, return shapes, pattern matching, error learning, input validation, Python cadence graceful failure, recovery cadences, D4 diagnostics, recommendation cadences, context management

units.title: Safety-critical engine unit tests
changes: M-031: Added 35 tests for PostProcessorEngine (12), WorkEnvelopeValidatorEngine (12), RTCP_CompensationEngine (11)
PostProcessor: multi-controller G-code generation (6 controllers), canned cycles, tap cycle, 5-axis TCPM
WorkEnvelope: valid toolpath, X/Y/Z violation detection, rapid-move critical severity, C-axis limits (C-001 fix verification)
RTCP: zero-angle compensation, A-axis tilt, C-axis rotation, 5 kinematic types, axis limit validation, singularity detection, error magnitude scaling

findings_resolved.note: U02 (calculation engine tests) deferred to follow-up session
